member.name: M:MPT.Enums.cEnumerations.GetEnumDescription``1(``0)
member.summary: Returns the enum description (if any), otherwise returns the name of the enum value.

member.name: M:MPT.Enums.cEnumerations.GetEnumXMLAttribute``1(``0)
member.summary: Returns the enum XML attribute (if any), otherwise returns the name of the num value.

member.name: M:MPT.Enums.cEnumerations.ConvertStringToEnumByDescription``1(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the enum if the string matches the enum description. Returns Nothing if no match is found.
member.param: String item to match to the enum by enum description.

member.name: M:MPT.Enums.cEnumerations.ConvertStringToEnumByXMLAttribute``1(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the enum if the string matches the enum XML attribute (or Enum.ToString() where no attribute exists). Returns Nothing if no match is found.
member.param: String item to match to the enum by enum description.

member.name: M:MPT.Enums.cEnumerations.GetEnumDescriptionList``1(``0)
member.summary: Returns the list of all descriptions for an enumeration list. Note that there is not always a description for every enumeration item.
member.param: Sample enumeration object from the list of enums.

member.name: M:MPT.Enums.cEnumerations.GetListItemMatchingEnumByXMLAttribute``1(``0,System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String})
member.summary: Returns the list item that matches the provided enumeration based on the XML attribute or .ToString() property of the enumeration. Returns nothing if no match was found.
member.param: List of values to match to the enumeration.

member.name: T:MPT.Enums.cEnumerations
member.summary: Contains methods for working with enumerations.
